name: Regulators
description: Authorities responsible for overseeing compliance with laws, policies, and regulations.

name: Government Authorities
description: Government institutions and agencies that establish and enforce rules and policies.

name: Service Providers
description: Organizations providing services such as telecommunications, internet, and infrastructure support.

name: International Organization
description: Global entities focused on setting international standards and guidelines for compliance and governance.

name: Fund
description: Financial institutions or funds responsible for resource allocation and investment management.
